snippet: The agreement to sell a Frank Lloyd Wright-designed house in Phoenix that has been under threat of demolition collapsed on Sunday as an anonymous buyer backed out of the deal.
abstract: Agreement to sell a Frank Lloyd Wright-designed house in Phoenix that has been under threat of demolition collapses as an anonymous buyer backs out of the deal.
lead_paragraph: The agreement to sell a Frank Lloyd Wright-designed house in Phoenix that has been under threat of demolition collapsed on Sunday as an anonymous buyer backed out of the deal.

headline.main: Arizona: No Deal for Wright House
headline.print_headline: Arizona: No Deal For Wright House
